record.dc:title: 40BT20, 15BT20, Butler County, Kentucky. Annis Village. Structure 8 Outline
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Mississippian Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: Wall outlines of structure 8, lying within the area of structure 7. Structure 8 outline differs from the other in that postmolds are not visible as a characteristic. View from south. See also photos 39, 40.
